reviews.review: Buen juego, recomendado!
it keeps constantly crashing everytime i try to play so i always have to reinstall which is so annoying,

Jogo muito bom, no inicio é super normal morrer do coração quando um killer chega do nada e começa a te perseguir kkkkkkkkk com o tempo acostuma. Com as atualizações o jogo melhorou consideravelmente e hoje voltei a jogar a pouco tempo. Tem muitos "killers" muito conhecidos do cinema como o Leatherface, Ghostface, Michael Myers e outros. Tem um sistema de competivo muito sutil, se você é um jogador de "normal game", não existe um modo competitivo, com o tempo que você joga, e ganha pontos com a partida o jogo te adapta com jogadores do mesmo nível para balancear, que vai do 20 até o 1.

다좋은데 메튜야 칼찌랑 시계 둘중하나만 없애라 
시발것아
bok gibi oyun almayın hayatımın 1200 saati çöpe gitti
可以入手 只为了恐怖感

Çok bug var.  (Belki bazıları oyuncuların lagından dolayıdır.)

Kitlesi kötü. Oyun sonu gereksiz eleştiri, küfür, ırkçılık. (Raporlamama rağmen ceza aldıklarını düşünmüyorum.)  Toxic oynayış tarzı çok yaygın. (Her oyun camp, tünel, tbag) Görev için girenler, Afk bırakanlar, Kan puanı kasanlar. Birlikte girip katilin yerini söyleyenler. (Çoğu perkin anlamı kalmıyor.)

Eşleştirme. Kendi başıma girerken sorun yaşamasam da başkalarıyla girmeye çalıştığımda hata ile karşılaşıyorum. Birllikte oynayamıyoruz kimseyle ranklarımız yakın olmasına rağmen. 3 5 defa tekrar eşleştirmeye girmemiz gerekiyor. Rankların da bir önemi olduğunu düşünmüyorum. Rankım 10 bile olmadan rank 1 2 adamlarla eşleştiriyor.
 
Dengesiz. Perkler ve Katiller arasında denge yok, bazı şeyler çok güçlü herkes onları alıyor, tabi görev yoksa.

Güncelleme. Gelen güncellemeler yüklenirken sıkıntı çıkarıyor, çoğu zaman dosya doğrulama yapmam gerekiyor. Bazen oyunu yeniden indirmen bile gerekiyor.

Onun dışında güzel oyun. Kan ağı sistemini seviyorum mesela.


(I used transtle)



There are many bugs. (Maybe some of them are due to players' lag.)

Its audience is bad. Endgame unnecessary criticism, swearing, racism. (Although I reported it, I don't think they were penalized.) The style of playing Toxic is very common. (Every game camp, tunnel, tbag) Those who enter for the mission, those who leave Afk, those who get blood points. Those who entered together and told the killer's location. (Most perks don't make sense anymore.)

Pairing. Although I have no problem logging in on my own, I encounter an error when I try to log in with others. We cannot play together, although our ranks are close with anyone. We have to re-match 3 5 times. I don't think ranks matter, either. Matches rank 1 2 guys without even my rank of 10.
 
Unbalanced. There is no balance between Perks and Killers, some things are very strong everyone gets them, unless there is a task.

Update. Incoming updates have trouble installing, most of the time I need file verification. Sometimes you even have to download the game again.

Other than that, it's a nice game. I like the blood net system, for example.

Dead by Daylight, is a multiplayer (4vs1) horror game where one player takes on the role of the savage Killer, and the other four players play as Survivors, trying to escape the Killer and avoid being caught, tortured and killed. Survivors play in third-person and have the advantage of better situational awareness. The Killer plays in first-person and is more focused on their prey. The Survivors' goal in each encounter is to escape the Killing Ground without getting caught by the Killer - something that sounds easier than it is, especially when the environment changes every time you play.

-Death Is Not An Escape!

This game is a lot like being in an abusive relationship- you're madly in love with it at first, and then after about 1000 hours of playing you realize that you've been trapped, but you've invested so much time and money into the game that it makes the thought of walking away too depressing. 
 The devs don't care about their player base- they're mostly killer mains themselves so they use the game as an echo chamber to build their own egos. The game is hideously unbalanced, and it's too easy for toxic players to take matches hostage (mostly on the killer side, but all it takes on the survivor side is one person to DC or decide to throw and the match might as well be over). The number of hackers in the game is ridiculous, and the report function in the end-game chat lobby does literally nothing. I've been saying forever that the devs need to make it so that blocking someone doesn't just block them in chat but also from getting matched into lobbies with you; that would at least allow players to alleviate some of the toxicity they experience. 
  

TL;DR- don't do it. It'll be fun at first but you'll come to realize that it's causing you more stress and/or depression than the game is worth. Go try other games, preferably ones where the developers actually listen to the players and work hard to improve their game.

super spiel man sollte aber beachten,

als Killer:
bist du der bespaßer für die 4 survivor deren arsch vergoldet wird mit zig 2chance perks und aus meiner sicht mit sehr vorteilhafte mechaniken (mit destrike, an gen arbeiten und sich wegziehen lassen/ in den schrank springen um sich rausziehen zu lassen) und vieles mehr egal wie scheisse sie spielen.
getbaged zu werden weil die survivor denken die besten spieler auf der welt zu sein.

als survivor:
sich drauf einstellen das gefrustete killer es an dir auslassen weil sich suvivor dieser mechanik (die oben genannten z.B.) nur alzu gerne bedienen.
man getunnelt wird weil die gens zu schnell gingen oder sich (der killer)  nicht anderster zu helfen weis.
man am haken abgecampt wird weil der killer denkt man erreicht damit was (blöder weisse zieht es viele suvs an wie die fliegen weswegen der killer dadurch meist sogar zuviel erfolg hat)

wenn man sich auf das alles einlassen will kann man viel spass mit dead by daylight haben.

ps.: spielt mit den anderen mitspielern so wie mit euch gespielten werden soll, in der hoffnung das diese toxice scheisse iwann ein ende hat

黎明杀机是我玩过最好玩的游戏，游戏没有任何缺点，晚上十一点维护也很正常只是我没见过世面，游戏卡顿是我电脑问题，游戏服务器如丝般顺滑，排到红段车队是为了锻炼我的技术，古书任务高效又便捷，不仅如此官方还大量更新可爱角色美丽皮肤，活动奖励丰富又不肝，是游戏之鉴，游戏界面非常整洁，角色建模十分帅气可爱，美工做得也很精致，所有角色上手难度适中，游戏体验非常好。打不了双皇一段都是我手和脑子不配，联机匹配掉线是我家路由器没买对

Este juego es bueno, el ambiente, los mapas, el diseño de los asesinos y demás cosas están super buenos, pero crack literalmente ser un superviviente es una mierda, este juego esta lleno de injusticias para los supervivientes, ya que por ejemplo los asesinos te pueden pegar cuando ya pasaste una tabla o cuando ya pasaste una ventana, que se suponen son obstáculos para que no te caze el asesino que ya de por si corre mas rápido que tu, incluso que tenga bugs con la hit box, también el hecho de los ganchos, como mierda spawnean ganchos cerca o literalmente al lado de los generadores y tu puedes decir: "pero man, quitalos con la caja de herramientas", CRACK el gancho se regenera en cuestión de segundos, mas te la pasas quitando el gancho de al lado que reparando, o puedes decir: "entonces prioriza esos generadores al principio de las partidas, asi te preocupas menos de ellos cuando ya pasa el tiempo", no man por que nosotros tenemos que buscar las cagas de generadores, en cambio oh a los asesinos les marcan los ganchos de una con amarillo fuerte y nosotros tapados de injusticias y bugs nos tenemos que comer el pijazo de los desarrolladores culiaos que ni pescan a la comunidad, dándoles todos los beneficios a los asesinos por que a un desarrollador le reventaron el hoyo siendo asesino y quiso bufearlos por lloron.

This game is quite a fun experience albeit at times it comes off as frustrating, but that is to be expected of an asymmetric game. It is hard to start but once you get your rythm going and you understand the game mechanics it can be quite fun and rewarding. Needless to say, this game is not for everyone, a lot of people tend to get frustrated by and its community that at times can come off as toxic, expecting people to work on one way or another.
I ought to mention, tho, there are usually some bugs here and there.

But overall, it is a fun experience. Either when you want to get scared as heck or have a laugh around with friends.
